org.openstack4j.openstack.logging

Interface Logger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLogger, ConsoleLogger, JDKLogger

    public interface Logger
    OpenStack4j Logging Abstraction Layer. Logging implementations are configurable by adding the desired OpenStack logging extension (SL4J, Log4j, etc). By default a Default Logging module is associated and only logs Error based messages. This can also be changed to Console based logging if a logging extension is not in the classpath.
    Author:
    Jeremy Unruh
